Title: TFS pending check-in alerts
Description: This application get all pending check-in files in the Team Foundation Server Source Control send e-mail alerts to a specific account and to the check-out file owner.

Welcome to the TFS pending check-in alerts project site!

Project Description
This application get all pending check-in files in the Team Foundation Server Source Control send e-mail alerts to a specific account and to the check-out file owner.
